component.name: ThemedRowList
component.script:
Sub Init()
print "ThemedRowList:Init"
m.global.observeFieldScoped("theme", "OnThemeChanged")
End Sub
Sub OnThemeChanged()
print "ThemedRowList:OnThemeChanged"
m.top.rowLabelColor = m.global.theme.textOnBackground m.top.focusBitmapBlendColor = m.global.theme.primary
End Sub
